title: Why was do poisons dot no longer proc thunderlords?
body: Teemo was actually fun and could compete with other laners  why the nerf?

replies.body: Because it was completely broken, and teemo is already annoying enough as a counterpick.
Who does he counter? trynd? how often is he played
they say it don't be like it is, but it do.

It wasn't a nerf.

It was a bug-fix.
